website_summaries.verdict: Brother's ADS-2700W is a fast, highly accurate document scanner that comes with Wi-Fi, Ethernet, and numerous mobile and cloud connectivity options for a very reasonable price.
pros: Supports Wi-Fi and Ethernet networking, as well as lots of mobile and cloud options

customer_reviews.title: Fast
customer_reviews.text: This is for the USB only model... It is: Fast at 24 double sided A4 at 30 seconds when set at 300dpi The software used on this is the basics and meets all my requirements. Light, small footprint. Software downloaded fron web, not supplied with machine. No USB connector supplied. After a couple of weeks of use, all the above holds but I still can't get over the speed. Reduced time spent on this very boring task dramatically.
customer_reviews.author: R. Castle

customer_reviews.title: My first new tech that works as promised
customer_reviews.text: Normally I buy hardware and something is always wrong. I'm always sending stuff back! This is the first time that something I bought (electronic) for a windows operating system actually does what it says. Actually I was so impressed with the first run of double sided scan I felt I had a new toy lol Hats off to the developers of this awesome product! Sam
customer_reviews.author: Sam Clough

customer_reviews.title: Translator Please
customer_reviews.text: I am guessing this scanner will do the job but haven't used it yet. The reason is I think we were provided with a post Brexit European version whenever that will happen??. No cable with a 3 pin plug and instructions in every language but English. I could try and fathom it out but I really do not have the time and not very IT savvy. As this was for a small office I am still waiting for an invoice and my team waiting to get scanning. I have managed to down load a 200 page user guide in English so when I loose the will to live I'll read it. Until then I cannot give a true star rating
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great once it was set up and running
customer_reviews.text: So we bought this and I could not work out at first why the machine would not run. the instructions seem confused and I was scratching my head once i found the right drivers and soft wear the thing is great but I was surprised at Brothers support which was not very supportive and wanted to charge for the set up advice!
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Quinn-Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Little beauty
customer_reviews.text: I got this because apparently I need to keep paper bank statements from 2003 onwards... I was getting ready for a day full on scanning and was finished before I felt like I'd even started. So then I went on the hunt for more things to scan. I know have a paperless home and lots of empty lever arch files. Couldn't recommend it enough.
customer_reviews.author: Nic MH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Machine
customer_reviews.text: Having spent £40 on scanning at a local facility, this has already paid for tself in the first couple of hours of use. User instructions are not that great so it's helpful to have some basic knowledge of networking. Thats said the Brother Help Desk is good and with Webchat they can sort things out. The unit is compact and easily stored in a drawer. It's certainly fast and hasn't thus far jammed. Quality is excellent and by experimenting with different outputs I've found a happy compromise or speed and reproduction. For home use it's brilliant and I wish I'd bought it before forking out £40.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Winteringham

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT SCAN TO CLOUD
customer_reviews.text: Despite Brother's advertising, if you want to scan direct to cloud, do not buy this model.
customer_reviews.author: R.Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Dedicated scanner
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use, and you get a choice of file types in which the document can be saved including 'pdf' which is what I needed. I also wanted a scanner where the document self fed - and this one does.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant document scanner
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased, and I am not a techie. It is very fast, neat, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Annca

customer_reviews.title: Space and hassle saver
customer_reviews.text: Neat, simple and should have bought one a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas F.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic desktop scanner
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic desktop scanner, compact and easy to set up. Speedy scanner with duplex scanning which saves me loads of time. Would definitely recommend. I can't comment on tech support as no need to use it as yet.
customer_reviews.author: AClark

customer_reviews.title: Defeated

product_meta.title: Brother ADS-2700W Document Scanner, Wireless/USB 2.0/Network, Desktop, 2 Sided Scanning, 35PPM, A4 Scanner, Includes AC Adapter, USB Cable and Document Management and Business Card Software
product_meta.description:
Size Name:35 ppm| Style Name:USB 2.0, Wired and Wireless Network (ADS-2700W)

With wireless and wired network, an LCD touchscreen, Windows/Mac compatibility, scan to USB and more, the ADS2700W is a reliable document scanner at an affordable price.

Scan to a variety of file types and optimise
Users can scan to searchable PDF, file, email, OCR, image and directly to USB flash drives while image processing features such as auto-deskew and hole punch removal ensure that digital backups of hard copies are more than just images – they become optimised, business-ready documents.

Free to download software package included
This Brother scanner is ready to go with powerful business card and document management software for Windows and macOS from Nuance® and NewSoft® - ideal for creating and editing PDFs and much more.

Connect to the entire office with USB, Ethernet or wireless
Offering true network capability, the wired and wireless enabled Brother ADS-2700W allows documents to be scanned directly from the machine to multiple devices on a shared connection meaning that important documents can be collaborated on across teams and departments with ease.

Features at your fingertips via a 7.1 cm LCD touchscreen
Using the colour touchscreen, scanned documents can be sent instantly to pre-configured profiles, saving preparation time and cutting down on staff training while the settings lockdown feature ensures higher levels of office security.

Small on size, big on efficiency and built to last
When the output tray is conveniently folded back into the unit's body, this space-saving desktop scanner takes up similar width and depth dimensions to that of a single piece of A4 paper. While compact in size, this 35ppm scanner is robust and reliable enough for daily business use thanks to its dependable passive roller system built to withstand thousands of scans per day.

50 sheet mixed media automatic document feeder
Its ability to process mixed media types (including double sided documents, small receipts and up to 1.32mm thick plastic ID cards) within the same feed allows users to quickly back up a variety of business critical documents quickly and efficiently in one pass.

Advanced Image Processing Features
The built-in range of powerful scanning tools intuitively prepare and clean scanned files, improving the quality of the scanned image for storing, editing, sharing and OCR (Optical Character Recognition) needs. This reduces file sizes for sharing and generates clearly legible articles when reading. This means less time spent manually preparing and correcting documents and more time spent focusing on the core of your business.

Not quite what you need?
If you're looking to integrate with your business more seamlessly with bespoke customisation capabilities, try the solutions-ready ADS-2800W and ADS-3600W scanners instead.



BOX CONTAINS


 * 1 x Brother ADS-2700W document scanner
 * 1 x UK 3-Pin AC adapter/power supply cable
 * 1 x Product safety guide
 * 1 x Quick setup guide
 * 1 x Warranty card

VERSATILITY: Easily scans business and embossed plastic I.D. cards, receipts, photos and documents via 50-sheet mixed media auto-feeder
EFFORTLESS: Simple operation and efficient shortcut creation via 7.1cm LCD colour touchscreen
INDUSTRY LEADING SOFTWARE: Includes powerful document management and business card software for Windows and Mac
